[[File:Alan Lee - The Death of Glaurung.jpg|250px|thumb|"The Death of Glaurung" by [[Alan Lee]]]]
The '''Ravines of Taeglin''' were the ravines into which the River [[Taeglin]] descended as it skirted the eaves of the [[Forest of Brethil]].<ref>{{S|Map}}</ref> They were used by [[Túrin|Túrin Turambar]] to climb beneath the belly of [[Glaurung]] and slay him.<ref>{{S|Turin}}</ref>
